intro.description: The aim of marketing process task is to know and understand the customer and so well the product or service fits him and sells itself.

item.title: MP.A1 - Analysis the market for the migrated solution.
item.description: The objective of this activity is to collect the relevant background information necessary for plans to be formulated and decisions to be made. It is required to analyse in a detailed way the current market situation for the migrated application, to analyse the organization's existing products/services situation and to analyse the competitive situation and the SWOT.

item.title: MP.A2 - Identify the Marketing objectives
item.description: During the realization of this activity and based on the analyses carried out in the previous activity the marketing objectives will be established and the strategic alternatives to reach these objectives will be evaluated.

item.title: MP.A3 - Identify the marketing strategy
item.description: The objective of this task is to tailor the marketing strategy in order to offer value to customers, to communicate the offer and to make it accessible and convenient

item.title: MP.A4 - Start implementing the market strategy
item.description: This activity has the objective to assure that the marketing strategy defined in the previous activity is implemented. For doing this, this activity will define appropriate actions for implementing the strategy , define a clear schedule, designate clear areas of responsibility and finally plan and assign an appropriate budget for carrying out the actions for marketing.

item.title: MP.A5 - Monitor the market plan
item.description: This activity will set in place control techniques for monitoring the marketing plan's performance. Usually this entails a systematic review of all aspects of the plan against targets set, usually on a monthly or quarterly basis. The review must be carried out regularly to ensure prompt attention and action in areas when the results lag behind targets set. Managers and others responsible for implementation of all elements of the action program should be involved in this activity. If during this activity it is discovered that marketing objectives are not the most appropriate ones, the process should be repeated from activity MP.A2.
